channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Man Down
channel.desc: Stories from men working in the music industry and the toll it has taken on their mental health and wellbeing. Featuring Rag'n'Bone Man, Dev IDLES and Geoff Barrow from Portishead.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Charlie are in Luton to create a cottage garden for Kim, who has a compact plot and a far-flung family.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is February and archaeologists Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn and historian Ruth Goodman approach the halfway point in their year on the Edwardian Farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Caroline Hawley, Danny Sebastian and Stu Abbott head to Buxton.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave Wellman comes to the aid of a couple in Cambridge, whose new cottage kitchen is in need of serious work. 5/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey visits Richmond Park's hunting lodge, goes racing at Ascot and is shown around some of the Queen's favourite West End haunts.

channel.title: Edwardian Farm

channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Sex Thief
channel.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruel Passion
channel.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Jack
channel.desc: Enjoyable romp set in the 18th century about a highwayman's adventures in the North of England. Ken Loach - taking a break from social realism - directs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Windrush Journeys
channel.desc: Stories of migration to South West London 1948-71 with stories from Windrush era onwards.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to design a traditional courtyard garden with a Turkish twist to remind Elaine and Kevin of their time spent living abroad.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is March, and Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn greet the long-awaited arrival of spring. It is time to bring in the daffodil harvest.

channel.title: Flipping Profit

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Stefan reports on the safety of American chlorinated chicken. Sian learns about the side effects of detox teas. Food made from insects too.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave Wellman is in Romford tackling a bouncy wooden floor with wood worm and laying an oak floor. 6/20.

channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey meets the members of the Sandringham Women's Institute who knew the Queen personally and learns how to become a horse whisperer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex With The Stars
channel.desc: A shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by having affairs with a woman from each star sign then writing about it. Contains sex scenes and 80s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Blood On Satan's Claw
channel.desc: In 18th-century England, a farmer finds a deformed skull, sparking a sinister influence over the village's youth, who fall under the grip of a demonic force. Folk horror classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to transform a tired old plot into a desert garden, reminiscent of Arabia, for John and Vanessa.

channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It's April and the fishing season has arrived. Alex and Peter go to sea in an Edwardian trawler. Ruth stays ashore and prepares potted shrimp.

channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler battle it out to make the most money. Kate Bliss, Danny Sebastian and Stu Abbott head to Ludlow.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Is British grass-fed beef the best regarding food miles? Is bottled water is worth the price. Plus, the healthiness of lunchtime meals.

channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave is in Gosport knocking down an internal wall to turn a property's outside toilet into a cloakroom. 7/20.

channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey's adventure concludes in Wales where she visits St David's Cathedral and a royal gold mine in Snowdonia. Last in series.

channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: School for Sex
channel.desc: Carry On-style comedy curio. A divorced man teaches girls how to swindle rich men - and in return he gets a cut of their takings. Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.
